title: gold casual team
body:
Just want to do ranked 5v5s.
Don't really need to main a role. 
Don't need mics.
Add me IGN: silverstoner
Message to add into team

Likely infrequent games . Idk when we will all be on to play.
Play casually {{item:3421}} dank kush

replies.body: I may be able to play. Add Instagram. Support or Top.
